item.description:
Where: on the PHONE

**Note: This is a long distance call; not toll-free.

** Phone # will be sent to you after you RSVP : YES"

********************************************************

"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm ...to Practice "The Work" & Share Your Experiences,

as well as join in
- with your questions
- to get support and suggestions
- to share your LOA experiences

Clarissa Rodriguez, BostonLOA member, presenter at January’s meetup, is on the call to answer any straggler questions & help you understand further how to apply Byron Katie's simple yet powerful process of inquiry related to The Work to separate yourself from your stressful stories and beliefs that don’t serve you.

Please have these 3 worksheets with you re: the Work to get the most of our discussion. If you’ve being using The Work, please come & share your experience. Also, here’s an opportunity to let us help you walk through a situation using the inquiry process.

(1) Instructions for Doing The Work
http://www.thework.co...

(2) One Belief At A Time Worksheet
http://www.thework.co...

(3) Judge Your Neighbor Worksheet
http://www.thework.co...

Read an excerpt from “Loving What Is” by Byron Katie re: The Work
http://www.thework.co...

The Work is about using a series of simple, specific questions that help you explore and unravel assumptions, projections and interpretations associated with your stressful "story". The power lies in your willingness to go within and answer each question honestly. You learn to check with your inner truth and bring forth clarity and lasting insight.


Thank you very much, Clarissa, for being available for our members this evening.

================

About Clarissa Rodriguez

By combining using The Work and Law Of Attraction principles, Clarissa's business and personal life has transformed "quantum leaps" this past year. Clarissa is also a successful serial entrepreneur.

Contact: crodriguez8@usa.net

www.getscouted.com ( launching soon )
www.ideabusinessbuilders.com
www.clearroadassociates.com
www.seventeenss.com
www.realityfilmscorp.com

item.name: BostonLOA TELE-Meetup: Join us to Practice "The Work"
